long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension focuses on adding an extra feature on Stock investing platform - https://www.smallcase.com/

🤷🏻‍♂️ Why ?
Every time we need to check current investment we need to click on refresh button or reload page. As Stock markets changes are much volatile user doesn’t get time to manually refresh and see latest changes.

🤔 What ?
"Smallcase live view extension" automates this process. where user can set Refreshing time in the extension, and it keeps refreshing latest values automatically after regular set intervals.

😎 How ?
Activate in 3 simple Steps:
👉🏻 Navigate to https://www.smallcase.com/investments
👉🏻 Click on extension icon from top menu bar in browser.
👉🏻 Enter refresh interval time and click on "Start".

Save time ⏳ and money 🤑.
